originalTitle: 'Half of my friends were killed' - the girls returning to a school caught up in war
title: 'Half of my friends were killed' - the girls returning to a school caught up in war
content: Twins whose classmates were killed by shelling say their deaths have made them determined to finish their studies.

originalTitle: Mandela's prison key, sunglasses and shirt can be sold after daughter wins court battle
title: Mandela's prison key, sunglasses and shirt can be sold after daughter wins court battle
content: The authorities tried to stop their export arguing they were part of the country's heritage.

originalTitle: Somaliland president pitches business opportunities to Trump's son
title: Somaliland president pitches business opportunities to Trump's son
content: He also met his counterpart from Israel which has recognised the independence of the breakaway region.

originalTitle: Greenland hit by power outage, strong winds in wake of US tensions easing
title: Greenland hit by power outage, strong winds in wake of US tensions easing
content: The blackout arrives as the government has encouraged citizens to be ready for a 'disaster' lasting up to five days.

originalTitle: Sudan’s women break ‘traditional rules’ to survive
title: Sudan’s women break ‘traditional rules’ to survive
content: Women forced into hard labour to survive as over eight million children face one of world's longest school closures.

originalTitle: Gaza’s tent life between illness and daily despair
title: Gaza’s tent life between illness and daily despair
content: Gaza faces public health crisis amid Israel's war, with waste, sewage and poor sanitation leading to disease outbreaks.

originalTitle: Trump threatens Canada with 100% tariffs if it 'makes a deal with China'
title: Trump threatens Canada with 100% tariffs if it 'makes a deal with China'
content: It comes as tensions appear to have escalated between Trump and Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney.

originalTitle: Trump says UK soldiers in Afghanistan 'among greatest of all warriors'
title: Trump says UK soldiers in Afghanistan 'among greatest of all warriors'
content: The US president's praise follows his claim that allied forces avoided the front lines during the Afghanistan conflict.

originalTitle: Peace talks on Russia-Ukraine war end as fighting rages
title: Peace talks on Russia-Ukraine war end as fighting rages
content: No breakthrough is reported at the first three-way talks but reports suggest they will resume next month.

originalTitle: Adli's stoppage-time winner ends Liverpool unbeaten run in thriller
title: Adli's stoppage-time winner ends Liverpool unbeaten run in thriller
content: Amine Adli scores a stoppage-time winner as Bournemouth end Liverpool's 13-game unbeaten run in a thrilling match at Vitality Stadium.

originalTitle: Bowen leads West Ham to important win over Sunderland
title: Bowen leads West Ham to important win over Sunderland
content: A fantastic first-half performance helps West Ham blow away Sunderland and move to within two points of 17th-placed Nottingham Forest and safety.

originalTitle: Late Romero header rescues draw for Tottenham at Burnley
title: Late Romero header rescues draw for Tottenham at Burnley
content: Cristian Romero rescues a point for Tottenham Hotspur late on just as under-pressure head coach Thomas Frank faced further embarrassment against struggling Burnley at Turf Moor.
